channel.title: Comments on: Azure DevOps Pipeline Decorators
channel.description: A blog about things I learn at the keyboard: DevOps, CI/CD, Cloud, Automation, to name a few....

item.title: By: Sathish
item.dc:creator: Sathish
item.description:

item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Raphael Hagi
